product_name: Arc'teryx A2B Commuter Long Bike Shorts - Women's
long_description: With their casual denim look disguising technical features, the Arc'teryx A2B Commuter Long Bike Shorts for women let you transition easily from bike commute to brewpub. Cotton/stretch polyester twill resists water, wicks sweat and dries more quickly than all-cotton. Ergonomic fit with articulated knees allows for freedom of movement when cycling. Reflective bands on flip-out back pocket flaps and inside lower hems let you show-and-glow as you ride, hide when you're off bike. Arc'teryx A2B Commuter Long Bike Shorts for women feature hand pockets, flapped back pockets, and 1 zippered thigh pocket. Gel Arc'teryx logo.
short_description: With their casual denim look disguising technical features, the Arc'teryx A2B Commuter Long Bike Shorts for women let you transition easily from bike commute to brewpub.
